Apis.Name: VirtualAlloc
Apis.Description: Allocates a region of memory and sets its protection attributes
Apis.Parameters: LPVOID lpAddress, SIZE_T dwSize, DWORD flAllocationType, DWORD flProtect

Apis.Name: VirtualFree
Apis.Description: Frees a region of memory previously allocated byVirtualAllocorVirtualAllocEx

ReturnValue.Description: TRUE if successful, FALSE if failed

Apis.Parameters: LPVOID lpAddress, SIZE_T dwSize, DWORD dwFreeType
